refnamediv.refpurpose: expensive GIF copy, a model for filter utilities

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This is an expensive way to copy a GIF. The source is included as a skeleton for more sophisticated filters. See the source in the util directory for details.
Also has some utility as a test of the sequential GIF record I/O routines. The output should be bytewise identical to the input.
